name: vscode-backtix
description: Easily convert plain strings to template literals and vice versa.

commands.title: Convert string to backticks
commands.enablement: !editorReadonly && editorLangId == javascript && config.backtix.conversions.convertToBackticks || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == typescript && config.backtix.conversions.convertToBackticks || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == javascriptreact && config.backtix.conversions.convertToBackticks || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == typescriptreact && config.backtix.conversions.convertToBackticks

commands.title: Convert string to single quotes
commands.enablement: !editorReadonly && editorLangId == javascript && config.backtix.conversions.convertToSingleQuotes || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == typescript && config.backtix.conversions.convertToSingleQuotes || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == javascriptreact && config.backtix.conversions.convertToSingleQuotes || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == typescriptreact && config.backtix.conversions.convertToSingleQuotes

commands.title: Convert string to double quotes
commands.enablement: !editorReadonly && editorLangId == javascript && config.backtix.conversions.convertToDoubleQuotes || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == typescript && config.backtix.conversions.convertToDoubleQuotes || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == javascriptreact && config.backtix.conversions.convertToDoubleQuotes || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == typescriptreact && config.backtix.conversions.convertToDoubleQuotes

commands.title: Add placeholder
commands.enablement: !editorReadonly && editorLangId == javascript && config.backtix.conversions.convertToBackticks || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == typescript && config.backtix.conversions.convertToBackticks || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == javascriptreact && config.backtix.conversions.convertToBackticks || !editorReadonly && editorLangId == typescriptreact && config.backtix.conversions.convertToBackticks

backtix.languages.description: Select the languages the conversions should be enabled for.

backtix.conversions.description: Specify the target quote types you want conversions to be offered for.

convertToSingleQuotes.description: The text for the option 'Convert to single quotes'.

convertToDoubleQuotes.description: The text for the option 'Convert to double quotes'.

convertToBackticks.description: The text for the option 'Convert to backticks'.

backtix.conversionTexts.description: Specify the tooltip and quick fix texts for the offered conversions.

text.description: The tooltip and quick fix text for the option 'Add placeholder'.

scripts.compile-web: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package-web: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js --production
